title:

Keep your Pixel 8 screen and camera lens protected with this high-quality tempered glass set. The screen protectors are ultra-thin, yet offer military-grade shatterproof protection, while maintaining original visual quality and high-response haptic touch. The camera lens protectors are scratch-resistant and shatterproof. With lifetime customer service and 24-hour support, you can trust that your Pixel 8 will always be in good hands. Don't compromise on protection and visual experience - get your LK 2 Pack today!
